title: Hello, Animals
summary: This book introduces wild animals to children. Each page shows the name and special feature of an animal, helping kids learn easily.

postQuestions.question: Which animal in the book do you like best?

missions.title: Draw Your Favorite Animal
missions.description: Choose your favorite animal and draw it. Show your picture to your friends.

vocabulary.definition: Animals that live freely in nature.
A monkey with a long, pointy nose.
A tall African animal with a long neck.
A big animal that lives in rivers.
A striped animal that looks like a horse.
A wild cat with many spots.
A huge animal with a long trunk that sprays water.
